welcome_message_body: Welcome to charming Edmond, where small-town charm meets big-city amenities. Discover our friendly community, vibrant downtown, and rich history as you explore all that our city has to offer. Enjoy your stay and make the most of your time in Edmond!

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Wiley Post Airport serves all commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Wiley Post Airport caters to private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Passengers can access free WiFi throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Tinker AFB Airport serves all commercial and military flights.

terminals.name: Military Terminal
terminals.description: The military terminal at Tinker AFB Airport serves all military flights and personnel.

wifi.note: Passengers can connect to the airport's free WiFi network after accepting the terms and conditions.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Will Rogers World Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Will Rogers World Airport, primarily serving domestic flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Sherman Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Sherman Airport caters to private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
